name: family_planning_careplan_flat
title: Flat view definition for Family Planning CarePlan resource
description: A flattened view of CarePlan resources specifically for Family Planning, extracting core details and activities.

column.name: id
column.description: The logical ID of the CarePlan resource.

column.name: status
column.description: The status of the CarePlan (e.g., active, completed).

column.name: patient_id
column.description: The ID of the Patient subject.

column.name: encounter_id
column.description: The ID of the Encounter context.

column.name: activity_detail_code_loinc_code
column.description: The LOINC code associated with the activity detail.

column.name: activity_detail_code_loinc_display
column.description: The display text for the LOINC code associated with the activity detail.

column.name: activity_detail_code_servicerequest_code
column.description: The ServiceRequest code associated with the activity detail.

column.name: ext_fp_positive_hiv_status_before
column.description: Extension (FP): Positive HIV status before service.

column.name: ext_fp_was_counselled
column.description: Extension (FP): Was the patient counselled.

column.name: ext_fp_came_with_spouse
column.description: Extension (FP): Did the patient come with their spouse.

column.name: ext_fp_service_location
column.description: Extension (FP): Location where the service was provided.

column.name: ext_fp_referred
column.description: Extension (FP): Referral information.

column.name: ext_fp_breast_cancer_symptoms
column.description: Extension (FP Cancer): Found with breast cancer symptoms.

column.name: ext_fp_breast_cancer_screened
column.description: Extension (FP Cancer): Screened for breast cancer.

column.name: ext_fp_cervical_cancer_suspected
column.description: Extension (FP Cancer): Cervical cancer suspected.

column.name: ext_fp_cervical_cancer_screened_via
column.description: Extension (FP Cancer): Screened for cervical cancer with VIA.

column.name: ext_fp_cervical_cancer_via_positive
column.description: Extension (FP Cancer): VIA test positive for cervical cancer.

column.name: ext_fp_hiv_status
column.description: Extension (FP HIV): Patient's HIV status.

column.name: ext_fp_hiv_referred_ctc
column.description: Extension (FP HIV): Patient referred to CTC.

column.name: ext_fp_spouse_hiv_status
column.description: Extension (FP HIV): Spouse's HIV status.

column.name: ext_fp_spouse_hiv_referred_ctc
column.description: Extension (FP HIV): Spouse referred to CTC.

column.name: ext_fp_breastfeeding
column.description: Extension (FP): Patient is currently breastfeeding.

column.name: ext_fp_sideeffect_bleeding
column.description: Extension (FP Side Effects): Experiencing bleeding.

column.name: ext_fp_sideeffect_headache
column.description: Extension (FP Side Effects): Experiencing headache.

column.name: ext_fp_sideeffect_got_pregnancy
column.description: Extension (FP Side Effects): Got pregnant while using method.
